1.text: Draw the outlines for the pig’s body, head, and snout.

2.text: Draw the outlines for the pig's upper legs.

3.text: Outline the lower portions of the legs.

4.text: Draw triangles under the legs and on top of the head for the ears and feet.

5.text: Draw a detailed outline using all of the shapes you’ve drawn so far.

9.text: Draw a bean shape with 2 small circles in it.

10.text: Draw the ears on top of the body.

11.text: Add an iris to each eye and then draw the legs.

12.text: Draw the snout, mouth, and hooves.

13.text: Add the details to your drawing.
